title: Rob Ferretti (from Adventure Drives)
description:
It's a road show! Matt is driving a Lamborghini Urus in Adventure Drives Pacific Northwest, an epic road trip that brings you and your car to some of the best roads and scenery on Earth. During a stop in Whitefish, Montana, he sits down with the organizer of the event, Rob Ferretti (@RobFerretti), to talk about the trip, the cars, and a whole lot more. 

 

Want to go on the best road trip of your life? https://adventuredrives.com/

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @RobFerretti @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @RobFerretti  @fakezackklapman

 

Watch the show on YouTube: https://youtu.be/c6q7f4nh6x4

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
